name: UpdateServiceCustomFieldOption
description:
Update a custom field option in a service.

Use this tool to update a specific custom field option for a service in PagerDuty. This is useful when you need to adjust configurations related to custom fields. Requires appropriate OAuth permissions.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the field to be updated.

parameters.name: field_option_id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom field option to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the field option.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the API to use for the request via the Accept header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The media type of the request. Use 'application/json' for JSON payloads.

parameters.name: field_option_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the field option, such as type and value. Ensure `data_type` matches the Field's data_type and `value` is unique within the field.

data_type.description: The kind of data represented by this option. Must match the Field's `data_type`.

value.description: The value of the field option. Must be unique within the field.

data.description: The data content of the field option.

field_option.description: An option for a custom field. Can only be applied to fields with a `field_type` of `single_value_fixed` or `multi_value_fixed`.
